name: Soulless (Sydmen)
description:
Find yourself in this puzzle-platformer as you play the role of a lone wanderer, searching for spirit fragments in hopes of becoming one again between body and soul. Use the duality of body and spirit to solve puzzles and climb the mountain!

HOW TO PLAY
Move - WAD
Switch to soul - Spacebar

OBJECTIVE
Get to the blue orb that holds a fragment of your spirit
Get the colored orbs to open the door with the matching colored lock

All assets and code were made during the jam

Sydmen - Programming and Sound Effects
thiccsnail- Art and Level Design
